resources.string: Scripts may be installed to make app content more accessible.
This includes personal data such as credit card numbers and passwords.
Tap to view usage and settings.
To unpin application, press and hold the recents and back keys at the same time.
To unpin application, press and hold the recents key.
Application no longer locked on screen.

"This function allows you to pin an application on your device screen so that you cannot navigate away from it.
To unpin an application, press and hold the recents and back keys at the same time."

"This function allows you to pin an application on your device screen so that you cannot navigate away from it.
To unpin an application, press and hold the recents key."
Now the mobile data is off. If you need to connect Internet, please enable it from notification bar.
Maximum size of text that can be copied exceeded. Only first 128 KB copied to clipboard.
To use Bluetooth keyboard, change input method to Samsung Qwerty keyboard.
Voice Assistant enabled. Voice feedback now provided. To disable, press Home key three times.
The Smart View connection is unstable. Ending the current connection and reconnecting may improve the display quality.
This SIM card is not supported.
Your device is not connected to a Wi-Fi network. Connecting to mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
Tap here to disable Restrict background data.
Your device is unable to make calls or connect to mobile networks.
Unable to power off device. Device locked by Power key lock.
Unable to restart device. Device locked by Power key lock.
Unable to enable Emergency mode. Device locked by Power key lock.
Smart network switch disabled (tap here to update and enable it)
This app can read when apps are pinned or unpinned.
Unable to enable Giga Multi-Path. Function not supported by data plan.
%s connection poor. Reconnecting via available network…
%s connection poor. Reconnecting via available network…
%s connection poor. Reconnecting via available network…
%s connection poor. Reconnecting via available network…
%s connection poor. Reconnecting via available network…
%s network temporarily not available. Reconnecting via available network…
%s network temporarily not available. Reconnecting via available network…
%s connection poor. Reconnecting via available network…
%s connection poor. Reconnecting via available network…
%s service not supported. Contact customer services.
Unable to enable %s while Flight mode enabled.
Unable to enable %s. Incorrect SIM card inserted.
Unable to enable %s while Mobile data turned off.
Unable to enable %s while roaming internationally.
Unable to enable %s. Device not connected to LTE network.
Unable to enable %s while Mobile hotspot or USB tethering enabled.
Unable to enable %s while Wi-Fi Direct enabled.
Failed to send %s activation request. Reconnecting via available networks…
Unable to enable %s. Device overheating. Wait until device cools down and try again.
%s disabled to prevent device overheating. Downloading via mobile network instead…
Data usage limit reached. To change data usage limit, go to Settings.
%1$s unable to use mobile data. Unblock %2$s and try again.
%1$s unable to use WLAN. Unblock %2$s and try again.
This app is an OMAPI system terminal.
This app can bind to OMAPI system terminals. Only SmartcardService can use this permission.
Security policy prevents use of Quick connect.
Configure device settings, such as Bluetooth, Location, Wi-Fi, Mobile data, and Android settings.
Configure system settings, such as Auto rotate screen, Multi window, notifications, and the device volume.
Lock down the device to provide access to only one or a few apps and disable the status bar.
Install, uninstall, disable, enable, and query app state. Restrict ability to install or uninstall specific apps.
Remove or roll back permissions for one or more apps.
Create, modify, and delete Exchange ActiveSync account settings.
Restrict the use of roaming networks.
Create, modify, and delete Wi-Fi profiles.
Install certificates, encrypt the device, remove selected data from the device, and wipe the device.
Restrict access to various hardware features.
Restrict access to various software features and services.
Restrict the use of location services.
Create, modify, configure, and delete IMAP/POP email accounts.
Create, modify, and delete network profiles.
Configure browser settings and restrict changes
Configure and restrict browser proxy settings.
Specify and query the device date and time. Modify the date and time format.
Create, modify, and delete VPN profiles for the Mocana VPN client.
Create, modify, and delete KNOX VPN profiles for non-Workspace traffic.
Create, modify, and delete VPN profiles for KNOX Workspace traffic.
Control enterprise policies on the device.
View device screen remotely and share key, touch, and trackball events with the device user.
Lock down the device to restrict access to only approved apps.
Create, edit, and delete KNOX Workspace and associated user accounts
Allow administrators to create audit logs.
Manage root CA (certificate authorities) used for certificate validation.
Create, query, and delete directory services (LDAP) accounts.
Configure dual SIM card device policy
Force calls, data, and SMS/MMS on dual SIM devices to go through a corporate SIM card.
This application can access MDM content providers.
Create, activate, and delete virtual perimeter (geofence) configurations.
Enable, disable, and manage multi-user capability.
Collect device data to analyse device performance and user behaviour.
Verify the integrity of the device firmware data.
Set data sharing restrictions for KNOX Workspace
Configure which KNOX Workspace data can be synced and shared with apps outside of the Workspace.
Use services for the storage and retrieval of digital certificates.
Universal Credential Management for eSE Storage
Manage eSE Storage using Universal Credential Management.
Universal Credential Management for third-party storage
Manage third-party storage using Universal Credential Management.
Work with third-party credential storage plug-ins.
Use KeyStore to generate and maintain secure cryptographic keys.
Create and manage SEAMS (SE for Android Management Service) containers. Manage SE for Android settings and log behaviour.
Enable control access cards (SmartCards) to authenticate users who access apps such as browsers and email clients.
Customise the lock screen, wallpaper, and emergency call settings.
Configure Enterprise DLP settings in KNOX mode
Allow the application to configure Enterprise DLP settings in KNOX mode.
Digital signature not valid for user %d
Manage the settings for automatic security policy updates.
This app does not support pop-up view.
Drag and drop a paragraph of text or a screenshot of an image into the other window.
%s does not support split screen view.
This app does not support split screen view.
Unable to use functions related to connected USB device while Ultra power saving mode enabled.
Unable to use functions related to the connected USB device while Emergency mode is enabled.
